Key Match Events: DR Congo maintained their perfect record in Group H of the Africa Cup of Nations qualifier with a narrow 1-0 victory over Tanzania at Stade des Martyrs.
The mishap occurred in the 53rd minute when Clement Mzize inadvertently deflected a Congo cross into his own net, giving the hosts a crucial lead.
Arthur Masuaku nearly doubled the lead for Congo, hitting the bar from a free-kick late in the second half.
Post-Match Reflections: The result leaves Tanzania needing a positive result in their next match to keep their qualification hopes alive.
